title: Meditation - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On
description: Meditation - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On
cleaned_text: Meditation - Aromatherapy & Crystal Organic Roll On This divine blend is suitable for everyday use. The Meditation oil is carefully formulated to provide a scent that is beautifully fragrant and deeply relaxing. Oils: Frankincense & Sweet Orange Gemstone Lapis Lazuli: stone of universal wisdom and truth. Directions: Apply to pulse points or chakras as desired. For external use only. 0.5 fl oz/15 ml Set the intention to get in touch with your higher self and receive wisdom with gratitude. CAUTION: If pregnant, nursing, or under doctor care, consult a physician. Discontinue use if skin irritation occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.
